short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes ratings to Netflix titles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Netflix browsing experience with NFRatings, a Chrome extension that seamlessly integrates IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes ratings directly into your Netflix interface.

# Key Features

1. IMDb Ratings: Instantly view IMDb ratings for Netflix titles without leaving the Netflix interface.

2. Rotten Tomatoes Ratings: Instantly view Rotten Tomatoes critic and user scores for Netflix content, making it easier to decide what to watch.

3. Customizable Filters: Adjust filter settings to display only the titles that meet your preferred IMDb, Tomato, and Popcorn score thresholds.

4. Easy Setup: Quickly configure your OMDb API key and start using the extension in seconds.

5. Seamless Integration: The extension runs automatically in the background, fetching and displaying ratings as you browse Netflix.


# Getting the OMDb API Access Key

1. Go to https://www.omdbapi.com/apikey.aspx and fill in the details.

2. Create the Access Key and copy it from the email reply.

3. Save it from the NFRatings Popup for the Extension in Chrome Browser.


# Open Source

https://github.com/tjs-w/nfratings
